definition: to emerge (from a comparison)/to come out as/to be competent or equal to
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
there's still time/able to do sth in time

pinyin: lai2 de5 rong2 yi4 , qu4 de5 kuai4

definition: arriving early can't beat coming at the right time/perfect timing
pinyin: lai2 de5 zao3 bu4 ru2 lai2 de5 qiao3

definition: arriving early can't beat coming at the right time/perfect timing
pinyin: lai2 de5 zao3 bu4 ru2 lai2 de5 qiao3

sentences.english: Compassion for other living things is more important than pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 對其他生命的惻隱之心比自身的享樂來得重要。

sentences.english: Before I could answer, she had turned around and started back out onto the field.
sentences.chinese: 我還未來得及回話，她已經轉身向足球場上走去了。

sentences.english: Results will usually be better than if you spend 2 hours lolly-gagging around the gym. But be warned.
sentences.chinese: 而且效果通常比你在健身房晃盪兩小時來得好。

sentences.english: She said she'd get up earlier than I.
sentences.chinese: 她說她今天一定比我來得早。

sentences.english: Hardly had I had time to say 'Goodbye' to the last year when the new year came here.
sentences.chinese: 還沒有來得及辭舊歲，新年就已經來到了。

sentences.english: In school teach him it is far more honourable to fail than to cheat.
sentences.chinese: 教他求學時不及格比作弊來得剛正。

sentences.english: He had pressed the button before we could stop him.
sentences.chinese: 我們還沒來得及阻止他，他已經按了電鈕。

sentences.english: I got up late this morning and went to school without feeding my cats.
sentences.chinese: 我早上起牀晚了，所以沒來得及喂貓就上學去了。

sentences.english: An art student from Hong Kong on Nanluoguxiang.
sentences.chinese: 香港來得藝術學生在垃圾桶旁邊抽菸。

sentences.english: This tender, juicy steak really hits the ot.
sentences.chinese: 這片多汁香嫩的牛排真是來得正是時候。

sentences.english: Anyway, if he leaves before I see him, then tell him I said hello.
sentences.chinese: 要是我沒來得及見他，他就走了，幫我問候他。

sentences.english: She encourages them to join the Birdwatching Club to get more information .
sentences.chinese: 她鼓勵他們加入觀鳥俱樂部來得到更多的信息。

sentences.english: The old fellow croaked before he could tell us who shot him.
sentences.chinese: 那老人沒來得及告訴我們是誰向他開的槍就斷氣了。

sentences.english: I'll wait for you at the school gate whether you come early or late.
sentences.chinese: 無論你來得早還是遲我都會在校門口等你。

sentences.english: It is better late than never.
sentences.chinese: 但遲做總比不做來得好。

sentences.english: Chadian President Idriss Deby says help is not coming soon enough.
sentences.chinese: 乍得總統代比說，協助來得不夠快。
